about_the_game:
Learn the Way of Bushido


A coming of age action rogue-like RPG that follows four heroes on an epic journey to save their homeland. Fast-paced action, stealth and strategy, changing runs and levels, experiment with different skills and builds!

A Hero's Journey


Battle (or sneak) your way through forests, high mountains, gold mines, and enemy territory. Encounter brainwashed foes, aggressive creatures, and ferocious bosses. Meet your allies at camp to gather your strength. RPG style dialogue tells the story of your rise to seasoned assassins. Music matches your environment. Orchestral, cinematic, and heart-pumping EDM tracks add to the immersive experience.

Game Features


  • Classic rogue-like RPG action, with all the modern conveniences.
  • Tight controls. Dash, Glide, Fly. Pick up a shield to do bullet-time reactions and counters.
  • Unique runs guarantee a random path to your destination.
  • Create the perfect build with thousands of combinations. Choose powerful spells and abilities to gain advantage over your foes!
  • Discover new powers at the Emporium. Permanently increase your chances of victory by augmenting your fate and constitution.
  • Friendly characters will join you on the Hero's Journey. Boastful and menacing foes will cross your path.
  • A player friendly tutorial aids you and new allies (local cooperative/multiplayer - up to 4) as you master new skills.
  • Meet the warriors of the Fae. The mysterious warriors of the Fae possess healing and tremendous damage dealing powers!
  • Beautiful comic-style animations and effects will enhance your play. Silly and helpful characters will join you on your quest.
  • A rich user interface allows you to track your build progress as well as your consumables.
  • Over 40 music soundtracks will immerse you in the world. Rich orchestral, cinematic, and electronic dance music offer a variety of soothing and pounding tracks.
  • Become seasoned assassins as you find Rare, Epic, and Legendary weapons, skills, and abilities!


Built-in Replay and Progression


With a classic rogue-like RPG style, each run will allow you to purchase permanent upgrades to all of your abilities. By defeating foes, powerful Ancient Insight will augment your abilities and grant you new weapons and skills. More powerful foes reward permanent items. The unique leveling system gives you hundreds of choices and allows you to explore different strategies and discover new areas.


A Colorful World


With classic Comic-RPG style visuals, a strange and beautiful world awaits you. The rogue-like progression system will reveal new areas as you attempt new runs.

  • OS: Windows 10 or Later

  • Additional Notes: 16:9 recommended

short_description: Coming of age action rogue-like RPG follows four young heroes' journey to save their homeland. Each run is unique, with changing levels, and new combinations of upgrades and powers. Experiment with different builds. Use rare gems to buy permanent upgrades and legendary weapons!
